result.translation: Dhugumatti, namni hunduu hoongoo keessa jira.

result.arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ
result.translation: Isaan amanan, gaggaarii dalagan, haqa walii dhaamaniifi obsa walii dhaaman malee (warri hafan hoongoo guddaa keessa jiru).
